For anyone:
https://github.com/ceolter/angular-grid/issues/34 - provide bootstrap demo / integration
https://github.com/ceolter/angular-grid/issues/37 - right click support
https://github.com/ceolter/angular-grid/issues/28 - nested properties

For Niall:
https://github.com/ceolter/angular-grid/issues/47 - allow adding items to menu
https://github.com/ceolter/angular-grid/issues/58 - update set filter when data changes
https://github.com/ceolter/angular-grid/issues/62 - extract pagination panel
https://github.com/ceolter/angular-grid/issues/63 - selection API
https://github.com/ceolter/angular-grid/issues/64 - filtering for pagination
https://github.com/ceolter/angular-grid/issues/86 - row deselection api
https://github.com/ceolter/angular-grid/issues/88 - message when no rows
https://github.com/ceolter/angular-grid/issues/90 - load cell template
